entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 2:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
